page.title: 19Springburn Shopping Centre
page.content: In Springburn Way,the Centre was open- ed in 1981.The seating area is set out like a railway station reflecting the link of Springburn with the railways. Open from Mon.-Sat.the Centre is kept clean.Security staff are always there. Those who use the Centre do so often. Many come more than once a week,others every day.Shops are varied but people would like more.There is a need for facilities for leisure and children. Advantages of the Centre-shops under cover;grouped together;near the homes. Many people enjoy the company.People disagree as to the relative prices of items here compared to those in the centre of Glasgow.Just over half asked said that they would travel to the centre of the city to buy goods that are available at the Shopping Centre.
